alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Waupaca, northwestern Outagamie and eastern Shawano Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Embarrass to near New London. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Navarino Wildlife Area around 610 PM CDT. Shawano around 625 PM CDT. Black Creek around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Nichols, Leeman, Sugar Bush, Shiocton, Landstad, Shawano Lake, Wolf River Bottoms Wildlife Area, Adams Beach, Lunds and Deer Creek Wildlife Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
